item.title: Was Frankenstein('s Monster) a Zombie?
item.description: The primary definition of a zombie, according to Google is as follows: a corpse said to be revived by witchcraft, esp. in certain African and Caribbean religions. Early religions lacked the scientific methods to explain everyday events and defaulted to labeling things that couldn’t otherwise be explained as witchcraft. It is through that stretch of the definition of a zombie that allow the walkersÂ on AMC’s The Walking Dead to be labeled zombies.
